alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:52PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Box Butte, Scotts Bluff, Banner, southwestern Dawes, southeastern Sioux, southeastern Goshen and northeastern Laramie Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 551 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Agate Bed National Monument to 6 miles south of La Grange. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Agate Bed National Monument around 555 PM MDT. Flahertys Corner around 630 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Scottsbluff and Melbeta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
